Q01.name: Rightful Owner
Q01.description: Steal an item from a player.

Q02.name: Mischievous creatures!
Q02.description: Take the mischievous gnome out of town and lead him 10 hexes away from the town.

Q03.name: Breaking the Ice
Q03.description: Win a fight with another player.

Q04.name: Finding Nemo
Q04.description: Escort the goldfish from the lake to the sea in the north. Move only through hexes along the longest river!

Q05.name: Parley?
Q05.description: Find pirates and offer them an item.

Q06.name: Wanted!
Q06.description: Find these criminal pirates and defeat them!

Q07.name: Self-sacrifice
Q07.description: Sacrifice your life for eternal glory!

Q08.name: Your Lucky Day
Q08.description: Leprechaun appeared! Pick 3 item cards and choose one. Then the next player in line chooses from remaining cards.

Q09.name: Kiss of Love
Q09.description: Go to the marshes and kiss the princess who was turned into a poisonous frog.

Q10.name: Find the Drunk Master
Q10.description: Roll the dice when you're in town. If you have rolled 6, you will see the drunk master.

WQ1.name: Tough One
WQ1.description: Hunt down the stone giant in the highlands.

WQ2.name: Waidmanns Heil
WQ2.description: Hunt the centaur in the forest.

WQ3.name: Venomous Foe
WQ3.description: Hunt down the Great Manticore in the desert.
